name: Canicas
description:
A microgame based on a counter for the Junior Programmer Pathway. It's a virtual recreation of a popular Mexican game played in small festivals, in which players have 5 marbles they can roll up the table to get the highest score they can!

In this microgame, players can move their marble and aim before firing. Get all 5 marbles inside the top holes to get the maximum score!

Credit to Tunetank (https://tunetank.com/track/5916-lounge-cafe/), EpidemicSound (https://www.epidemicsound.com/es/sound-effects/user-interface/) and pixabay (https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/marble-drop-93150/) artists for the music and sfx!

Also playable without download at: https://play.unity.com/mg/other/canicas-0
